contentrichtext.text: Articles [[Jonas Martin Panik]], [[Georgine Rose Corrigan]] and [[Deborah Jacobs Welsh]] listed on [[WP:VFD]] Apr 16 to May 3 2004, consensus was to transwiki to 911 wiki and delete. Discussion: 9-11 victims not otherwise notable. [[User:DJ Clayworth|DJ Clayworth]] 21:07, 16 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Keep. Not notable for anything aside from 9/11, but 9/11 is enough. [[User:Everyking|Everyking]] 23:01, 16 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Delete like the others. - [[User:SimonP|SimonP]] 23:10, Apr 16, 2004 (UTC) *Delete. 9/11 is NOT enough, unless we're going to rename this project USAPedia. Besides, keeping these articles and others like them implies that an article should be written on anyone else who has ever been a casualty of any non-war event. [[User:Jeeves|Jeeves]] 00:27, 17 Apr 2004 (UTC) **No it doesn't. It implies that when a society attaches particular importance to the deaths of certain people, articles should be written about them. [[User:Everyking|Everyking]] 00:40, 17 Apr 2004 (UTC) *** ''Society'' attaches no importance to the deaths of these particular people. Importance was attached to the fact that people died at all. Who they were was almost irrelevant. Memorial and delete. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 01:09, Apr 17, 2004 (UTC) *Delete. [[User:SWAdair|SWAdair]] | [[User talk:SWAdair|Talk ]] 04:45, 17 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Move to 9/11 memorial and delete. [[User:Wile E. Heresiarch|Wile E. Heresiarch]] 04:55, 17 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Move to [http://www.sep11.wikipedia.org sep11 wiki] and delete. [[User:Maximus Rex|Maximus Rex]] 04:58, 17 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Delete according to policy. [[User:Cribcage|Cribcage]] 06:39, 17 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Move and delete, as per usual. [[User:Average Earthman|Average Earthman]] 11:04, 19 Apr 2004 (UTC) *Keep. Whether or not they're notable doesn't matter, but in this case they are. [[User:Anthony DiPierro|anthony]] [[User:Anthony_DiPierro/warning|(see warning)]] * Wikimemorial and delete. [[User:Rossami|Rossami]] 21:09, 20 Apr 2004 (UTC) * Delet and -> Wikimemorial: We have a policy, let's apply it. [[User:JimD|JimD]] 00:27, 2004 Apr 24 (UTC) *delete, nonfamous. --[[User:Jiang|Jia]][[User talk:Jiang|'''ng''']] 05:24, 25 Apr 2004 (UTC) * delete. non famous. [[User:Garryq|garryq]] 22:41, 2 May 2004 (UTC) * Delete. Non-famous. [[User:Fredrik|Fredrik]] 15:36, 3 May 2004 (UTC) ''End discussion'' The following vote was added after this discussion was archived: * Keep. [[User:BL|BL]] 16:05, May 3, 2004 (UTC)
